description.narrative: (Tanzania): With FY 2019 funds, Tusome Pamoja will address issues noted in the 2018 Decentralized Periodic Learning Assessment (DPLA), which shows that between 2017 and 2018 there have been statistically significant - although geographically uneven - improvements in some reading skills (lower order skills), while challenges remain with regard to higher order skills. FY 2019 funding will strengthen both low order skills where required, and higher order skills. Tusome Pamoja will support Ward Education Officers (WEOs) to improve their administrative and academic oversight in schools by providing coaching and mentoring support to teachers in respective activity regions, as well as leading Communities of Learning. In response to the curriculum areas of focus for Standards 3 and 4 in mathematics in Mtwara and Zanzibar, Tusome Pamoja will introduce teacher reference and support materials on multiplication and division..... .. .
